name: Nightmare Island (Eneri_777)
description:
This was a university project (2021) in which we had to make a whole island walking simmulator that makes the player feel a emotion, this one being a horror themed one to scare players.

As you walk, you'll have to face your fears and don't let them consume you, as there's a secret hidden in the depths of this lonely and scary island.

Special thanks to Valerio Marty for his tips to make this project better.

You can find me on Twitter, Instagram and Twitch
